text.text_translated:
What the speaker said is very true. I really think there is a danger with technology. When we connect more with technology, we can feel more alone.

This is not a big problem for people my age. We lived for a long time without technology. We know how to be alone. We also know it is okay to be alone.

But young people are very different. They are always talking to other people. So they never experience solitude. Solitude is when you are alone. They may not learn to enjoy time with only themselves.

Also, they learn to talk with messages. They can change these messages. Because they learn this way, it is harder to learn real conversation. A real conversation is with another person. That person is with you.

best_attempt.text_translated:
What the speaker said is very true. I really think there is a danger with technology. We connect more with people online. But this can make us feel more alone.

This is not a big problem for people my age. We lived for a long time without technology. We know how to be alone. We also know it is okay to be alone.

But young people are very different. They are always talking to other people. So they never experience solitude. Solitude is when you are alone. They may not learn to enjoy time with only themselves.

Also, they learn to talk with messages. They can change these messages. This stops them from learning how to have a real conversation. A real conversation is with another person. That person is with you.
